title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
Introducing the Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit! This award-winning kit is perfect for those looking to explore the fascinating world of structural engineering. With its easy-to-understand instructions and hands-on experiments, it's designed to be easily accessible to elderly folks who may be easily confused.

This kit includes everything you need to build 20 different models, including bridges and skyscrapers. With a total of 285 pieces, you'll have plenty of options to unleash your creativity. The illustrated experiment manual and Assembly guide, containing 36 pages, will guide you every step of the way.

Through this kit, you'll learn important concepts such as force, load, compression, and tension. You'll also explore various structural elements like columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary. Additionally, you'll discover different types of forces, including tension, compression, shear, and bending.

The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit also covers different bridge types, including truss bridges, arch bridges, cantilever bridges, rope bridges, and suspension bridges. You'll gain a deep understanding of how these structures work and the principles behind their construction.

This kit is perfect for those with an intermediate skill level. It has been recognized with the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award, ensuring its quality and educational value. The kit comes in a vibrant blue color, making it visually appealing and engaging.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to explore the fascinating world of structural engineering. Order your Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers Science & Engineering Kit today and embark on a series of 20 model-building experiments. With its easily accessible instructions and comprehensive learning materials, it's the perfect choice for elderly individuals who want to engage in a stimulating and educational activity.
